text: The Texas Cowboy Monument is an outdoor memorial commemorating Texas' cowboys, installed on the Texas State Capitol grounds in Austin, Texas, United States. The monument was sculpted by Constance Whitney Warren and erected in 1925. It features a bronze statue of a cowboy on a rearing horse atop a concrete base. ==See also== * 1925 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:1925 establishments in Texas Category:1925 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Texas Category:Equestrian statues in Texas Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Sculptures of men in Texas
title: Texas Cowboy Monument
